verses.verse: 'You shall not <S%H6213>make<s%> for yourselves <S%H457>idols,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> shall you <S%H6965>set<s%> up for yourselves an <S%H6459>image<s%> or a [sacred] <S%H4676>pillar,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> shall you <S%H5414>place<s%> a <S%H4906>figured<s%> <S%H68>stone<s%> in your <S%H776>land<s%> to <S%H7812>bow<s%> <S%H7812>down<s%> to it; for I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>
'You shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> My <S%H7676>sabbaths<s%> and <S%H3372>reverence<s%> My <S%H4720>sanctuary;<s%> I am the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>
<S%H518>'If<s%> you <S%H1980>walk<s%> in My <S%H2708>statutes<s%> and <S%H8104>keep<s%> My <S%H4687>commandments<s%> so as to <S%H6213>carry<s%> them out,

then I shall <S%H5414>give<s%> you <S%H1653>rains<s%> in their <S%H6256>season,<s%> so that the <S%H776>land<s%> will <S%H5414>yield<s%> its <S%H2981>produce<s%> and the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> will <S%H5414>bear<s%> their <S%H6529>fruit.<s%>

'Indeed, your <S%H1786>threshing<s%> will <S%H5381>last<s%> for you <S%H5381>until<s%> <S%H1210>grape<s%> <S%H1210>gathering,<s%> and <S%H1210>grape<s%> <S%H1210>gathering<s%> will <S%H5381>last<s%> <S%H5381>until<s%> <S%H2232>sowing<s%> <S%H2233>time.<s%> You will thus <S%H398>eat<s%> your <S%H3899>food<s%> to the <S%H7648>full<s%> and <S%H3427>live<s%> <S%H983>securely<s%> in your <S%H776>land.<s%>

'I shall also <S%H5414>grant<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%> in the <S%H776>land,<s%> so that you may <S%H7901>lie<s%> <S%H7901>down<s%> with <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H369>one<s%> making [you] <S%H2729>tremble.<s%> I shall also <S%H7673>eliminate<s%> <S%H7451>harmful<s%> <S%H9130>beasts<s%> from the <S%H776>land,<s%> and <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H2719>sword<s%> will <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H5674>through<s%> your <S%H776>land.<s%>
'But you will <S%H7291>chase<s%> your <S%H340>enemies,<s%> and they will <S%H5307>fall<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you by the <S%H2719>sword;<s%>

<S%H2568>five<s%> of you will <S%H7291>chase<s%> a <S%H3967>hundred,<s%> and a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> of you will <S%H7291>chase<s%> <S%H7233>ten<s%> <S%H7233>thousand,<s%> and your <S%H340>enemies<s%> will <S%H5307>fall<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you by the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>
'So I will <S%H6437>turn<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> you and make you <S%H6509>fruitful<s%> and <S%H7235>multiply<s%> you, and I will <S%H6965>confirm<s%> My <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with you.
'And you will <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H3465>old<s%> <S%H3462>supply<s%> and <S%H3318>clear<s%> out the <S%H3465>old<s%> <S%H4480>because<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the <S%H2319>new.<s%>
'Moreover, I will <S%H5414>make<s%> My <S%H4908>dwelling<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> you, and My <S%H5315>soul<s%> will not <S%H1602>reject<s%> you.
'I will also <S%H1980>walk<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> you and be your <S%H430>God,<s%> and you shall be My <S%H5971>people.<s%>

'I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H3318>brought<s%> you out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H4480>so<s%> that [you] should not be their <S%H5650>slaves,<s%> and I <S%H7665>broke<s%> the <S%H4133>bars<s%> of your <S%H5923>yoke<s%> and made you <S%H1980>walk<s%> <S%H6968>erect.<s%>
'But <S%H518>if<s%> you do not <S%H8085>obey<s%> Me and do not <S%H6213>carry<s%> out <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H4687>commandments,<s%>

<S%H518>if,<s%> instead, you <S%H3988>reject<s%> My <S%H2708>statutes,<s%> and <S%H518>if<s%> your <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H1602>abhors<s%> My <S%H4941>ordinances<s%> so as not to <S%H6213>carry<s%> out <S%H3605>all<s%> My <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> [and] so <S%H6565>break<s%> My <S%H1285>covenant,<s%>

I, in <S%H637>turn,<s%> will <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> to you: I will <S%H6485>appoint<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> you a <S%H928>sudden<s%> <S%H928>terror,<s%> <S%H7829>consumption<s%> and <S%H6920>fever<s%> that shall <S%H3615>waste<s%> <S%H3615>away<s%> the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> and cause the <S%H5315>soul<s%> to <S%H1727>pine<s%> <S%H1727>away;<s%> also, you shall <S%H2232>sow<s%> your <S%H2233>seed<s%> <S%H7385>uselessly,<s%> for your <S%H340>enemies<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> it up.

'And I will <S%H5414>set<s%> My <S%H6440>face<s%> against you so that you shall be <S%H5062>struck<s%> <S%H5062>down<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> your <S%H340>enemies;<s%> and those who <S%H8130>hate<s%> you shall <S%H7287>rule<s%> over you, and you shall <S%H5127>flee<s%> when <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H369>one<s%> is <S%H7291>pursuing<s%> you.

<S%H518>'If<s%> also <S%H5704>after<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H428>things,<s%> you do not <S%H8085>obey<s%> Me, then I will <S%H3256>punish<s%> you <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H7651>times<s%> <S%H3254>more<s%> for your <S%H9128>sins.<s%>

'And I will also <S%H7665>break<s%> <S%H7665>down<s%> your <S%H1347>pride<s%> of <S%H5797>power;<s%> I will also <S%H5414>make<s%> your <S%H8064>sky<s%> like <S%H1270>iron<s%> and your <S%H776>earth<s%> like <S%H5154>bronze.<s%>

'And your <S%H3581>strength<s%> shall be <S%H8552>spent<s%> <S%H7385>uselessly,<s%> for your <S%H776>land<s%> shall not <S%H5414>yield<s%> its <S%H2981>produce<s%> and the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> shall not <S%H5414>yield<s%> their <S%H6529>fruit.<s%>

<S%H518>'If<s%> then, you <S%H1980>act<s%> with <S%H7147>hostility<s%> <S%H5973>against<s%> Me and are <S%H3808>unwilling<s%> <S%H14><s%> to <S%H8085>obey<s%> Me, I will <S%H3254>increase<s%> the <S%H4347>plague<s%> on you <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H7651>times<s%> according to your <S%H9128>sins.<s%>

'And I will <S%H7971>let<s%> <S%H7971>loose<s%> among you the <S%H9130>beasts<s%> of the <S%H7704>field,<s%> which shall <S%H7921>bereave<s%> you of your <S%H7921>children<s%> and <S%H3772>destroy<s%> your <S%H929>cattle<s%> and <S%H4591>reduce<s%> your number so that your <S%H1870>roads<s%> <S%H8074>lie<s%> <S%H8074>deserted.<s%>
'And <S%H518>if<s%> by <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H428>things<s%> you are not <S%H3256>turned<s%> to Me, but <S%H1980>act<s%> with <S%H7147>hostility<s%> <S%H5973>against<s%> Me,

then I will <S%H1980>act<s%> with <S%H7147>hostility<s%> <S%H5973>against<s%> you; and I, <S%H1571>even<s%> I, will <S%H5221>strike<s%> you <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H7651>times<s%> for your <S%H9128>sins.<s%>

'I will also <S%H935>bring<s%> upon you a <S%H2719>sword<s%> which will <S%H5358>execute<s%> <S%H5359>vengeance<s%> for the <S%H1285>covenant;<s%> and when you <S%H622>gather<s%> together into your <S%H5892>cities,<s%> I will <S%H7971>send<s%> <S%H1698>pestilence<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> you, so that you shall be <S%H5414>delivered<s%> into <S%H340>enemy<s%> <S%H3027>hands.<s%>

'When I <S%H7665>break<s%> your <S%H4294>staff<s%> of <S%H3899>bread,<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H802>women<s%> will <S%H644>bake<s%> your <S%H3899>bread<s%> in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8574>oven,<s%> and they will <S%H7725>bring<s%> <S%H7725>back<s%> your <S%H3899>bread<s%> in <S%H4948>rationed<s%> <S%H4948>amounts,<s%> so that you will <S%H398>eat<s%> and not be <S%H7646>satisfied.<s%>
'Yet <S%H518>if<s%> in spite of <S%H2088>this,<s%> you do not <S%H8085>obey<s%> Me, but <S%H1980>act<s%> with <S%H7147>hostility<s%> <S%H5973>against<s%> Me,

then I will <S%H1980>act<s%> with <S%H2534>wrathful<s%> <S%H7147>hostility<s%> <S%H5973>against<s%> you; and I, <S%H637>even<s%> I, will <S%H3256>punish<s%> you <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H7651>times<s%> for your <S%H9128>sins.<s%>
'Further, you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of your <S%H1121>sons<s%> and the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> you shall <S%H398>eat.<s%>

'I then will <S%H8045>destroy<s%> your <S%H1116>high<s%> <S%H1116>places,<s%> and <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>down<s%> your <S%H2553>incense<s%> <S%H2553>altars,<s%> and <S%H5414>heap<s%> your <S%H6297>remains<s%> on the <S%H6297>remains<s%> of your <S%H1544>idols;<s%> for My <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall <S%H1602>abhor<s%> you.

'I will <S%H5414>lay<s%> <S%H2723>waste<s%> your <S%H5892>cities<s%> as well, and will <S%H8074>make<s%> your <S%H4720>sanctuaries<s%> <S%H8074>desolate;<s%> and I will not <S%H9552>smell<s%> your <S%H5207>soothing<s%> <S%H7381>aromas.<s%>
'And I will <S%H8074>make<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H8074>desolate<s%> so that your <S%H340>enemies<s%> who <S%H3427>settle<s%> in it shall be <S%H8074>appalled<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> it.

'You, however, I will <S%H2219>scatter<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations<s%> and will <S%H9553>draw<s%> out a <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> you, as your <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H1961>becomes<s%> <S%H8077>desolate<s%> and your <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H1961>become<s%> <S%H2723>waste.<s%>

<S%H227>'Then<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> will <S%H7521>enjoy<s%> its <S%H7676>sabbaths<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of the <S%H8074>desolation,<s%> while you are in your enemies' <S%H776>land;<s%> <S%H227>then<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> will <S%H7673>rest<s%> and <S%H7521>enjoy<s%> its <S%H7676>sabbaths.<s%>

<S%H3605>'All<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of [its] <S%H8074>desolation<s%> it will <S%H7673>observe<s%> the <S%H7673>rest<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> it did not <S%H7673>observe<s%> on your <S%H7676>sabbaths,<s%> while you were <S%H3427>living<s%> on it.

'As for those of you who may be <S%H7604>left,<s%> I will also <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H4816>weakness<s%> into their <S%H3824>hearts<s%> in the <S%H776>lands<s%> of their <S%H340>enemies.<s%> And the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of a <S%H5086>driven<s%> <S%H5929>leaf<s%> will <S%H7291>chase<s%> them and even when <S%H369>no<s%> one is <S%H7291>pursuing,<s%> they will <S%H5127>flee<s%> as <S%H4499>though<s%> from the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and they will <S%H5307>fall.<s%>

'They will therefore <S%H3782>stumble<s%> over <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H251>other<s%> as if [running] from the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> although <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H369>one<s%> is <S%H7291>pursuing;<s%> and you will <S%H1961>have<s%> [no strength] to <S%H8617>stand<s%> up <S%H6440>before<s%> your <S%H340>enemies.<s%>
'But you will perish among the <S%H6>nations,<s%> and your enemies' <S%H1471>land<s%> will <S%H776>consume<s%> you.

'So those of you who may be <S%H7604>left<s%> will <S%H4743>rot<s%> <S%H4743>away<s%> because of their <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> in the <S%H776>lands<s%> of your <S%H340>enemies;<s%> and <S%H637>also<s%> because of the <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> of their forefathers they will <S%H1>rot<s%> <S%H4743>away<s%> with them.

'If they <S%H3034>confess<s%> their <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> and the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of their forefathers, in their <S%H1>unfaithfulness<s%> <S%H4603>which<s%> they <S%H834>committed<s%> against Me, and <S%H4603>also<s%> in their <S%H637>acting<s%> with <S%H1980>hostility<s%> <S%H7147>against<s%> Me –

I <S%H637>also<s%> was <S%H1980>acting<s%> with <S%H7147>hostility<s%> <S%H5973>against<s%> them, to <S%H935>bring<s%> them into the <S%H776>land<s%> of their <S%H340>enemies<s%> – <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H227>if<s%> their <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%> <S%H3824>heart<s%> <S%H3665>becomes<s%> <S%H3665>humbled<s%> so that they <S%H227>then<s%> <S%H7521>make<s%> <S%H7521>amends<s%> for their <S%H5771>iniquity,<s%>

then I will <S%H2142>remember<s%> My <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> and I will <S%H2142>remember<s%> <S%H637>also<s%> My <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> and My <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with <S%H85>Abraham<s%> as <S%H637>well,<s%> and I will <S%H2142>remember<s%> the <S%H776>land.<s%>

'For the <S%H776>land<s%> shall be <S%H5800>abandoned<s%> by them, and shall <S%H7521>make<s%> up for its <S%H7676>sabbaths<s%> while it is <S%H8074>made<s%> <S%H8074>desolate<s%> <S%H4480>without<s%> them. They, meanwhile, shall be <S%H7521>making<s%> <S%H7521>amends<s%> for their <S%H5771>iniquity,<s%> <S%H3282>because<s%> they <S%H3988>rejected<s%> My <S%H4941>ordinances<s%> and their <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H1602>abhorred<s%> My <S%H2708>statutes.<s%>

'Yet in <S%H637>spite<s%> <S%H1571><s%> of <S%H2088>this,<s%> when they are in the <S%H776>land<s%> of their <S%H340>enemies,<s%> I will not <S%H3988>reject<s%> them, <S%H3808>nor<s%> will I so <S%H1602>abhor<s%> them as to <S%H3615>destroy<s%> them, <S%H6565>breaking<s%> My <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with them; for I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> their <S%H430>God.<s%>

'But I will <S%H2142>remember<s%> for them the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with their <S%H7223>ancestors,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> I <S%H3318>brought<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> that I might be their <S%H430>God.<s%> I am the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>' "

<S%H428>These<s%> are the <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and <S%H4941>ordinances<s%> and <S%H8451>laws<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5414>established<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> Himself and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3027>through<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> at <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H5514>Sinai.<s%>
